docs.title: Attention Is All You Need
docs.description: The foundational paper that introduced the Transformer architecture, the core neural network for most LLMs.

docs.title: The Illustrated Transformer
docs.description: A highly visual and intuitive explanation of the Transformer architecture, breaking down its components.

docs.title: Deep Learning Book - Chapter 10: Sequence Modeling: Recurrent and Recursive Nets

docs.title: Hugging Face Transformers Documentation
docs.description: Comprehensive documentation for the Hugging Face Transformers library, which provides implementations of many LLM architectures.

blogs.title: The Illustrated GPT-2
blogs.description: A visual explanation of the GPT-2 model, detailing its neural network architecture and how it generates text.

blogs.title: A Gentle Introduction to Large Language Models
blogs.description: An accessible overview of LLMs, touching upon the neural network concepts that power them.

blogs.title: Understanding Transformer Networks in NLP
blogs.description: A blog post explaining the Transformer architecture and its significance in Natural Language Processing.

blogs.title: The Annotated Transformer

youtube.title: What is a Transformer? (NLP)
